envReport 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Map points from a data frame with coordinates in columns x and y

Source: R/data_name_map.R
data_name_map.Rd

Map points from a data frame with coordinates in columns x and y

data_name_map(
  df,
  x = "long",
  y = "lat",
  map_class = NULL,
  polys = NULL,
  polys_col = NULL,
  polys_name = NULL,
  polys_palette = NULL,
  aoi = NULL,
  in_crs = 4283,
  out_crs = 4326,
  ...
)

Arguments

df

Dataframe with coordinate columns.
x

Character name of column with X coordinates (e.g. "long").
y

Character name of column with Y coordinates (e.g. "lat").
map_class

Optional character name of column to include in map legend.
polys

Simple feature with polygons to map points on.
polys_col

Column in polys to include in map legend.
polys_name

Character name to give to polys legend title.
polys_palette

Vector of column colours to use for polys.
aoi

Object on which sf::st_bbox will return a bounding box for the map output.
in_crs

Coordinate reference system of x and y in df. Can be given as any coordinate reference system recognised by sf::st_crs (e.g. EPSG code).
out_crs

Coordinate reference system of resulting map.
...

tmap::tm_dots arguments. Note col, title, palette and legend.format are already defined within data_name_map

Value

tmap object

Contents
